body.name: Travel Backpack, Carry On Backpack for Women, Airline Approved Personal Item Bag, Lightweight Weekender Bag, Laptop Backpack Hiking Business Casual Gym Daypack, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Airline Approved Personal Item Bag】Beraliy travel backpack meets airline carry-on requirements, suitable for placing on the top or under the seat in flights as personal item. 0-180 degrees opening zipper helps you pass through the security check quickly. It is approved by most airlines, such as Easy Jet, Spirit, Southwest, Jet Blue and Frontier Airlines. (Size: 43 x30 x 20 cm/16.9 x 11.8 x 7.9 inches ; Weight : 2LB)

【Convenient Charging Hole Design】This college backpack designed with a convenient charging hole design, you can connect the power bank inside the backpack and the mobile phone outside, it is offer a more convenient way to charge your phone while walking. (Note: The power bank and cable are not included). Perfects for weekender, bussiness trip, weekend getaways, shopping & outdoor activities in daily life.

【Spacious Capacity & Compartments】This 35L laptop backpack has multiple compartments and can meet the needs of short travel or business trips of 3-5 days. The laptop compartment is filled with EVA foam to provide optimal protection for your 15.6" laptop and 12.9" iPad, the wet bag is designed to store wet items, and the front compartment has many pockets to keep your small items organized and easier to find.

【Luggage Strap & Practical Design】This carry on travel backpack features a hidden padded shoulder straps which can be easily hidden inside the back panel. The luggage strap design allows the personal item bag to fix on the luggage tube, helping you to free your hands and back, making your air travel and business trips easier. The top and sides of the backpack are designed with soft handles for easy daily use.

【Lightweight & Widely Used】 In addition to its lightweight, environmentally friendly and durable fabric, backpacks are also not easy to wrinkle. This carry-on luggage backpack serve you well as office work bag/Duffle Bag/Shoulder Bag/Travel Bag/Gym Backpack/Teacher Backpack/College Backpack /Laptop Backpack. It is the best gift for men women: parents, friends, lover and teachers in birthday,christmas and other holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Gift & Functional
reviews.reviewText: A great friend of mine was starting her travels for the year and I purchased this as a gift to congratulate her. She loved it! The color is beautiful, the backpack is light, and the compartments are perfectly placed, PLUS you get a small bag with it which she used for her makeup. I loved this so much for my friend, that I later purchased one for me. Great gift & worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Travel Backpack
reviews.reviewText: Purchased it a month ago and went on a Winter trip in Austria, Switzerland, France and Germany. It is durable, light and easy to clean. It can fit 3 days worth of outfit with toiletries. The multiple pocket is best feature of this bag. I highly recommend this bag especially for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great To Use As Your Personal Item
reviews.reviewText: Great item to use as your personal item when traveling on an airline. Fits perfectly under the seat. Lots of compartments. Back straps were padded for extra comfort. Did not give a 5 start on water resistance because I didn't get to find out how it does in water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This backpack is very stylish and it’s a great size for what I needed. I go away for the weekends with my 2 year old son a lot and I needed an extra bag to put all our clothes and toiletries in, and I picked out this one because I thought it would be like a suitcase backpack. Unfortunately, the only thing this backpack has in common with a suitcase is how the zipper opens a part of the bag. It opens on all three sides fully so you can pull the flap all the way back and load you backpack that way, instead of only being able to unzip an ordinary backpack halfway down on both sides and just shoving all your stuff down until you can’t fit anymore. I took off one star because, from the pictures on Amazon, I’d perceived the outer shell of the backpack to be a little rigid, like a hard shell suitcase, but it isn’t at all. It’s just as flimsy as any other backpack material. I gave it four stars for the uniqueness of the way it unzips, for the high quality material and stitching, and for the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for price
reviews.reviewText: Great bag, used it for a trip back home worked great. Small enough for personal item but holds lots of stuff. Light, durable easy to work with and access. Will use this often. Great buy for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits so much
reviews.reviewText: Love this backpack. Saves me a lot of $ when traveling using a personal item only! Fits my computer, good amount of clothes, I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This a great computer travel bag!
reviews.reviewText: Just used it on my first trip. Its roomy. Lots of compartments. Very durable ! definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No phone pocket
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize this backpack doesn't have a hidden or side pocket for your phone. Somewhere you can quickly stick your phone as you're walking. It has a pocket and opening for a charger but not to place your phone outside the bag. That sucks for when I wear clothes without pockets! The smaller pocket on the front of the backpack is single zipper and opens from the other side, so you can't use that for your phone.I was also hoping the bag would be taller as to fit as many things as possible and still fit under the seat in an airplane.Other than that, it's a good, nylon bag with lots of pockets and pretty light. The chest straps can be hidden if you want to carry it by hand.
